message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value and would be a great asset to you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is significantly below my asking price.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm unable to meet at $17,500. My maximum budget remains at $15,000. Would you be willing to negotiate down to this amount?
